channel.title: Linux on DistributedFog

item.title: Resin.io
item.description:
Resin.io offers a development and deployment framework based upon Linux and containers that is designed to facilitate control of the on-device environment, provision devices on the network, and manage a fleet of systems. resin.io The Good Developer friendly: iterate and push 20 supported maker devices Container-based Open Source: ResinOS, Balena First 10 devices free
Features … Control on-device environment Provision devices easily Manage device fleet at scale Automate device fleet from own cloud Encrypted communication Continuous updates
